Burrock: Hey, liz boy, mind speaking your orders out next time?

He burrows underground and follows Shadow Star.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Kyle Stewart <dewboy30816@y...> wrote:
> SS goes to Black Dragon mode and flies toward the Maxi
> base.
> 
> --- warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@h...> wrote:
> > OOC: Goodbye, bro, and thanks for playing! See ya in
> > the real world!
> > 
> > Bic:
> > 
> > Tyrael was intrigued. How could three bases be on
> > this planet? Ho 
> > well, they'll have to destroy one more, nothing
> > more.
> > 
> > Tyrael: Very well, Naga. You will stay here to guard
> > the base. Shadow 
> > Star, you will command group Tripod, with you and
> > Burrock. You will 
> > attack the most northern base (ooc: maxies). Talon
> > and me, as group 
> > Trian, will attack the nearest one (ooc: preddies).
> > Remember, this is 
> > a hit and run. Our objectives are to pinpoint them
> > and hit hard if 
> > possible. Break off the engagement at any signs of
> > heavy defense. 
> > Everyone ready?
> > 
> > Burrock: An attack already... I think I might like
> > you, lightbird! Any 
> > casualties allowed?
> > 
> > Tyrael: Just as long as its not one of you, the
> > more, the better.
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "black_ben14" <black_ben14@h...>
> > wrote:
> > > ooc:sorry guys this will be my last post.After
> > that I would like 
> > rauq 
> > > to take me out of NBWRPG.I'm giving my chars to
> > whoever wants them.
> > > 
> > > BIC:~Naga~
> > > 
> > > He checked the scanner and after a few moment he
> > turns to Tyrael 
> > "Sir 
> > > the scanner have found 3 bases(the Decepticon dont
> > seem so alive).
> > 
> > 
> > 
>
